output: A tranquil Japanese garden bathed in the soft glow of late afternoon sunlight, petals of delicate pink cherry blossoms gently swirling to the ground like snowflakes. The vibrant greenery surrounding the scene blends seamlessly into the dappled hues cast by the blossoming branches, creating an atmosphere of peaceful serenity.
